summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2947, for the improvement of 1st Avenue North from the south margin of Comstock Street to Lee Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein concrete sidewalks and concrete curbs; by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35588 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
